thread.title: Granit Xhaka enjoys night out with glamorous girlfriend
thread.title_full: Granit Xhaka enjoys night out with glamorous girlfriend | Daily Mail Online

author: Will Griffee For Mailonline
title: Granit Xhaka enjoys night out with glamorous girlfriend
text:
Granit Xhaka posted a photo on Instagram with his girlfriend Leonita Lekaj as the couple enjoyed a night out.
The Arsenal midfielder has been serving a suspension and appears to be enjoying some time off.
Xhaka and Lekaj have been together since his time with Borussia Monchengladbach and lived with each other in Germany for four years.
Granit Xhaka shared this picture with his long-term girlfriend Leonita Lekaj
The couple have been together since Xhaka's time with Borussia Monchengladbach
Xhaka was shown red in the Gunners' 2-1 win against Burnley for a studs-up tackle on Steven Defour.
As the sending off was his second of the season, the Swiss international has been forced to sit out four matches.
The good news for Arsene Wenger is that his combative midfielder is available to play in Arsenal's upcoming Champions League match.
Xhaka has been serving a four match suspension for a red card against Burnley
The Swiss international is available for selection against Bayern Munich on Wednesday
The London side face a tricky first leg away at Bayern Munich and could recall Xhaka for added solidity in the engine room.
Francis Coquelin could make way for the 24-year-old should Wenger make a change for Wednesday's tie.
If his Instagram is anything to go by, the Â£30million man is well rested and ready to slot back into the Arsenal midfield though fans may be concerned at his increasingly poor disciplinary record.
Xhaka has been sent off more than anyone in Europe's top five leagues since last season
